element.short: in-progress | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | unknown
element.definition: Will generally be set to show that the administration has been completed.  For some long running administrations such as infusions it is possible for an administration to be started but not completed or it may be paused while some other process is under way.
element.comment: This element is labeled as a modifier because the status contains codes that mark the resource as not currently valid.

binding.description: A set of codes indicating the current status of a MedicationAdministration.
